title: Kurwin's Cauteriser
content:
rwin's Cauteriser Information

Cauteriser: Deals an additional 1~4 Fire damage. On a hit, the target starts Burning unless it succeeds a Constitution Saving Throw. Range: 1.5

BG3 Kurwin's Cauteriser Location & Where to Find

Location: Graveyard in Baldur's Gate, on a kobold named Bugthimble. (The clue can be found on Tough Letter. You need to dig the Dirt Mound at X 8, Y 24 in Lower City Graveyard)

Kurwin's Cauteriser Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 65 Gp. Weight: 1.35 Kg.
